infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Connect needs access to your location to show you nearby activities and help you connect with local communities.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Connect needs access to your photo library to let you upload profile pictures and activity images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Connect needs access to your camera to let you take pictures for your profile and activities.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Connect to use your location to show nearby activities and help you connect with local communities.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Connect to access your photos to let you upload profile pictures and activity images.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Connect to access your camera to let you take pictures for your profile and activities.
